A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was much better than The Force Awakens. Although it's not a perfect film\, it doesn't feel like a clone like TFA\, and feels like Star Wars whereas Force Awakens felt like it was missing something (emotion\, feeling\, etc). This one has humor\, emotion\, great space battles\, and funny critters.

I would rank it close to Rogue One\, not as good as Episode 3 or the original trilogy\, but better than Ep 1\, 2 and TFA.

All the babies crying that this film sucks because it didn't follow the formula they wanted need to get over it because this was definitely a great movie that's worth seeing.
